item.title: About me
item.author: lonepie+githubpages@gmail.com (Jonathon Rogers)
item.description: I’m glad that you asked! You see, back in the early days of online gaming, I used the handle, Lone_Wolf. It wasn’t long until I found out that many other people were using that handle as well. I needed something unique. Pie happens to be one of my favourite things. The rest, as they say, is history. About me I have a decade of professional web development experience and a lifetime of general computer experience (I was practically raised by my computer).
